title: 今時今日以下同stat/數學有關既stream 邊樣最搵到食/最有前景

replies.msg:
1.精算
2.risk management
3. Decision analytics
4.data analytics
5. Operation research
6. Quantitative finance
Computer Science

quote.msg: Computer Science

replies.msg: minor Stat

quote.msg: Computer Science

replies.msg: How abt maj stat minor CS ?

quote.msg: Computer Science
minor Stat

replies.msg: 姐係都係行data science geh field ?

其實係睇人
唔係睇major
pure math 讀個master 可以做哂你講既所有野
前提係讀得掂pure

stat／數既stream唔易讀 好多人真係努力完都讀唔黎 讀到quit/third hon grad
如果真係讀個話
1.精算 最專 但都唔少話呢行就收皮 但實況上都係有一定需求 做得好個話唔難上位
2.risk management 真係想做翻呢行個話其實要到master level 不過讀呢範個話係商界果邊都會有人請 始終算係比較難入既科
3. Decision analytics 好新既科 好難評價 個感覺係咩都有小小 唔太建議
4.data analytics 以後會越黎越有用同越黎越有需求 學得好又有好既programming知識就無敵
5. Operation research 其實就係management science既前身 要真係做翻呢範既工唔容易 不過可以容易d去做商科人做既工
6. Quantitative finance 讀得好個話大把範數 可以做比普通finance人專好多既工 大把bank/ibank back office等緊請呢班人

我自己覺得個話 讀得好既 4=6=1>2>5>3 正正常常既 6>1>2>4>5>3
利申 其實唔係太識

3. decision analytics
4. data analytics
Machine learning

replies.msg:
其實數/stat既野都一定難架啦 個難度分別無你想像中咁大
雖然咁樣既心態唔正確 不過難度上唯獨既分別就係睇下邊範會讀得小啲數
黎緊讀poly msc in operation research and risk analysis ,發覺讀既course 可以分為上面張list 咁多個stream ,大家覺得我應該簡邊個stream 讀， 邊個stream 多 entry post ,前景 邊個好d,我都知呢個　degree 廢廢地，無奈我bachelor 係三大乞食chem ,想讀quant 轉行

quote.msg: 黎緊讀poly msc in operation research and risk analysis ,發覺讀既course 可以分為上面張list 咁多個stream ,大家覺得我應該簡邊個stream 讀， 邊個stream 多 entry post ,前景 邊個好d,我都知呢個　degree 廢廢地，無奈我bachelor 係三大乞食chem ,想讀quant 轉行

replies.msg: 老實講 master開始讀個話無論邊個都無話特別好 但係可以肯定咁講 如果想做quant就qfin同data analysis入面簡啦

Compulsory :
Operation research methods
Advanced operation research methods
Probability and stochastic models ( SOA related :exam P)
Principle of risk analysis
Simulation and risk analysis
Business forecasting
Financial modelling

Elective course( at least 3 course , can be more than 3)

Optimization methods
Scheduling
Statistical inference
Scientific computing
Mathematics of finance (soa related: exam FM)
Investment science (soa related: exam MFE
Mathematics of derivative pricing (soa related :exam MFE)
Loss model
Multi criteria optimization
Risk analysis of epidemics
Statistical data mining
Stochastic optimization
Supply chain analysis
Principle of coporate finance
Coporate risk management
Economics for financial analysis
Supply chain management
